name: Chaotic: Shadow Warriors
description:
Chaotic: Shadow Warriors is a strategy game developed by Activision, Fun Labs and Sand Grain Studios. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Chaotic: Shadow Warriors on Wii, Nintendo DS and PlayStation 3. The game is sold via PlayStation Store and Nintendo eShop.
Michael Haigney produced the game. It was scored by Elik Alvarez, Freddy Sheinfeld, Joel Douek and John Angier.
